1064:3: iha saṃsaraṇaṃ saṃsṛtiḥ gatergatya ntaragamanaṃ saṃsāra ityucyate |
1064:6: na hi avidyamānānāṃ vandhyāsūnusaṃskārāṇāṃ saṃsaraṇaṃ dṛṣṭam |
1064:7: tasmāt saṃsārasadbhāvāt vidyata eva bhāvānāṃ svabhāva iti |
1064:13: sa niyataṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ vā bhavet sattvasya vā?
1064:16: saṃskārāḥ saṃsaranti cenna nityāḥ saṃsaranti te |
1064:17: saṃsaranti ca nānityāḥ sattve'pyeṣa samaḥ kramaḥ ||1||
1064:19: kiṃ te nityāḥ saṃsaranti uta anityāḥ?
1064:28: athāpi syāt - anityā eva santo hetuphalasaṃbandhaparaṃparayā avicchinnakramāḥ saṃtānena ca pravartamānāḥ saṃskārāḥ saṃsarantīti |
1064:38: uttarasmin kṣaṇe utpanne pūrvaḥ saṃsaratīti cet,
1064:43: kiṃ ca ekatve sati pūrvottarakṣaṇavācyataiva na syāt |
1064:44: na hi eko devadattaḥ ekadā pūrvaścottaraśceti vyapadiśyate |
1064:45: evamihāpi ekatvāt pūrvottarakṣaṇavyapadeśa eva na syāt |
1064:46: api ca pūrvakṣaṇo naṣṭa iti na syāduttarakṣaṇavadavyatiriktatvāt |
1064:66: yadā ca pūrvottarakṣaṇavyavasthā kāryakāraṇavyavasthā ca nāsti,
1064:68: tadabhāvānnāsti bhavatāṃ saṃsāra iti anityānāmapi saṃskārāṇāṃ nāsti saṃsāra iti ||
1064:69: atraike varṇayanti -satyaṃ saṃskārā na saṃsaranti utpattividhuratvāt,
1064:75: iti vicāryamāṇe ya eva saṃskārāṇāṃ saṃsaraṇānupapattikramaḥ,
1064:78: atrāha - naiva hi sattvasaṃskārāṇāṃ saṃsārānupapattikramaḥ samo bhavitumarhati,
1064:82: tasmādātmaiva saṃsaratīti na coktadoṣaprasaṅga iti | ucyate -
1064:98: ityevaṃ pañcadhā mṛgyamāṇa ātmā na saṃbhavati pūrvoditena nyāyena |
1064:99: yaścedānīṃ skandhāyatanadhātuṣvevaṃ vicāryamāṇaḥ pañcadhā na saṃbhavati,
1064:107: yadi anupādānasya sato'sya saṃsāro yuktaḥ syāt |
1064:108: kathaṃ punarasya anupādānatā prasajyata iti pratipādayannāha -
1064:110: iha hi manuṣyopādānāddevopādānaṃ gacchan parityajya vā manuṣyopādānaṃ devopādānaṃ gacchedaparityajya vā?
1064:119: yaśca anupādāno nirañjano'vyakto nirhetukaḥ, kaḥ saḥ?
1064:122: tasmiṃścāsati tadabhāvādeva upādānamapi nirupādātṛkaṃ nāstīti kiṃ saṃsariṣyati?
1064:131: pūrvasyāparityāgāduttarasya ca grahaṇād yasmādekasyātmano dvayātmakatā syāt |
1064:135: taiśca sopādānatvāt sopādānaṃ saṃsarato'pi na vibhavatāprasaṅga iti |
1064:145: etāvāṃstu viśeṣaḥ yadantarābhavasaṃcāre'tisāmīpyāt sūkṣmaṃ kālamanupādānaḥ syāt |
1064:146: na ca sarvātmanā ekasya padārthasya abhinnapadārthasya viṣaye yugapat tyāgopādāne dṛṣṭe |
1064:147: na hi ekasya devadattasya sarvātmanā gṛhādgṛhaṃ saṃcarataḥ ekadā tyāgopādānakriye dve saṃbhavataḥ |
1064:148: atha ekena pādena ekasya parityāgādaparasya copādānād yugapattyāgopādāne parikalpyete,
1064:149: nanu evaṃ sati pādadvayavad dvayātmakatā ātmanaḥ syāt |
1064:151: tasmād yaugapadyenāpi tyāgopādāne na saṃbhavataḥ ityaparihāra evāyam |
1064:152: tasmādantarābhavopādāne'pi sa eva doṣaprasaṅga iti sarvathā ātmano'pi nāsti saṃsāraḥ ||
1064:169: tat parikalpyamānaṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ nityānāṃ vā parikalpyeta anityānāṃ vā?
1064:171: anityānāmapi asaṃvidyamānānāṃ kiṃ nirvāṇaṃ kuryāditi sarvaṃ pūrveṇa tulyam |
1064:174: tadapi nityasya vā anityasya vā pūrvavannopapadyate ||
1064:176: nanvevaṃ sati nirvāṇe'pyātmāstītyabhyupeta bhavati saṃsāra iva |
1064:179: na ca nirvāṇe upādāna mastīti kuto'sya avācyatā?
1064:181: api tu kimasau nirvāṇe'sti uta nāsti?
1064:182: yadi asti, tadā mokṣe'pi tasya sadbhāvānnityatā syāt |
1064:183: atha nāsti, tadā anitya ātmā syāt |
1064:184: tataśca tattvānyatvāvācyatāvannityānityatvenāpi ātmanaḥ avaktavyateti na syāt |
1064:188: na tarhi nirupādāno'sāvātmā nirvāṇe vijñeyatvāt saṃsāra iva |
1064:195: buddhadharmā āyuṣman subhūte māyopamāḥ svapnopamā ityādi |
1064:211: tasmād bandhamokṣasadbhāvād vidyata eva bhāvānāṃ svabhāva iti |
1064:217: saṃskārāḥ pūrvavatsattvo badhyate na na mucyate ||5||
1064:218: iha ya ime rāgādayaḥ kleśāḥ baddhānāmasvatantrīkaraṇe bandhanamiti vyapadiśyate,
1064:219: yaiśca baddhāḥ pṛthagjanāḥ traidhātukaṃ nātikramantīti vyavasthāpyate,
1064:220: tadetadrāgādikaṃ bandhanatvena parikalpyamānamudaya vyayadharmiṇāṃ tāvat kṣaṇikānāṃ saṃskārāṇāmutpādānantaradhvaṃsināṃ naṣṭānāmasattvānna saṃbhavati |
1064:223: yathā ca pūrvoktavidhinā saṃskārāṇāṃ bandhamokṣau na saṃbhavataḥ,
1064:224: evaṃ pūrvavadeva sattvo'pi na badhyate nāpi mucyate,
1064:226: atrāha - yadyapi saṃskārāṇāṃ sattvasya vā bandho nāsti,
1064:245: yaścaivaṃ nirūpyamāṇaḥ sopādāno nirupādāno vā na badhyate,
1064:249: yadā caivaṃ nirūpyamāṇaṃ bandhanaṃ na kaṃcidapi badhnāti,
1064:250: tadā kaṃcidapyabadhnata upādānasya rāgādeḥ kuto bandhanatvamiti |
1064:255: iha bandhyavyatirekeṇa bandhanaṃ nigaḍādikaṃ pūrvasiddhaṃ sat bandhyaṃ devadattaṃ badhnātīti dṛṣṭam |
1064:256: evaṃ yadi bandhyebhyaḥ saṃskārebhyaḥ pudgalādvā bandhyātpūrvaṃ rāgādikaṃ bandhanaṃ siddhaṃ syāt,
1064:257: tena pūrvasiddhena bandhanaṃ syāt saṃskārāṇāṃ pudgalasya vā |
1064:259: pūrvasiddhasya ca bandhanasya paścād bandhyena saha saṃbandhasya niṣprayojanatvāt |
1064:260: bandhyasya ca bandhanātpṛthaksiddhasya pūvabandhanāpekṣāniṣprayojanatvācca nāsti bandhyādbandhanasya pūrvasiddhiḥ |
1064:262: na ca kaṃcidapyabadhnato bandhanatvaṃ yuktamiti nāsti bandhanam|
1064:268: baddho na badhyate tāvadabaddho naiva badhyate |
1064:272: tathāpi saṃsāracārakāgārāvabaddhānāmatrāṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ mahākāruṇikaistathāgataiḥ śīlasamādhiprajñātmakarakandhatrayopadeśo yadarthamuktaḥ,
1064:278: ihāyaṃ mokṣaḥ parikalpyamānaḥ baddhasya vā parikalpyeta abaddhasya vā?
1064:281: baddho na mucyate tāvadabaddho naiva mucyate |
1064:283: tatra baddhasya mokṣo na saṃbhavati baddhatvāt |
1064:284: atha baddhasya paścādupāyena mokṣa iti kṛtvā baddha eva mucyate iti syāt,
1064:285: na tarhi baddho mucyata iti vaktavyam,
1064:289: tadā samīpe syāt yadā tu kasyāṃcidapyavasthāyāṃ mokṣe iṣyamāṇe baddhasya mokṣāsaṃbhavena mokṣābhāvaḥ pratipipādayiṣita tadā kuto vartamānasamīpatā?
1064:290: evaṃ tāvad baddho na mucyate iti sthitam ||
1064:294: muktānāṃ cārhatāṃ punarapi mokṣāpekṣatvād baddhataiva syāt,
1064:296: atha syāt - abaddhasya mokṣāsaṃbhavād baddha eva mucyate iti,
1064:297: evaṃ sati baddhe mucyamāne parikalpyamāne baddhatvānmucyamānatvācca yaugapadyena bandhamokṣaṇe syātām |
1064:298: na ca parasparaviruddha tvādālokāndhakāravadekasmin kāle bandhamokṣaṇe upapadyete |
1064:304: ya eṣa saṃsāra vinirmumukṣūṇāmavidyāsāndrāndhakāravividhakudarśanakaṭhinātidīrghalatāsaṃchāditasatpathaṃ jātyādivividhā paryantavyasanāniṣṭataravipulavipākaphaladānuśayaviṣavṛkṣasaṃkulaṃ viṃśatiśikharasamunnatatarātipṛthusatkāya dṛṣṭimahāśailapariveṣṭitasarvadiṅmukhaṃ viṣayasukhāśātipicchilavipulamahātaṭavivaravāhitṛṣṇānadīmahāparikhaṃ saṃsāramahāṭavīkāntāraṃ nistitīrṣūṇāṃ paramāśvāsakaraḥ kuśalo mahādharmacchandaḥ,
1064:310: yo hyevaṃ niḥsvabhāveṣu sarvabhāveṣu pratibimbamarīcikājalālātacakrasvapnamāyendrajālasadṛśeṣu ātmātmīyasvabhāvarahiteṣu viparyāsamātrānugamāt tāmeva satkāyadṛṣṭim ahaṃ mametyahaṃkāramamakārasamudācāraparigraheṇotpādya manyate -
1064:316: nanu tadeva ahaṃkāramamakārākhyaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭayupādānameṣāṃ mahāgraho bhavati,
1064:321: tāvanniyatameva anupāyena nirvāṇaṃ prārthayatāṃ sarva evārambhā vyarthā bhavanti |
1064:324: atha khalu bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - caturṇāmāryasatyānāṃ yathābhūtārthādarśanāccaturbhirviparyāsairviparyastacittāḥ satvāḥ evamimamabhūtaṃ saṃsāraṃ nātikrāmanti |
1064:325: evamukte mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocat - deśayatu bhagavān kasyopalambhataḥ sattvāḥ saṃsāraṃ nātikrāmanti |
1064:328: yo hi mañjuśrīrātmānaṃ paraṃ ca samanupaśyati,
1064:330: bālo mañjuśrīraśrutavān pṛthagjanaḥ atyantāparinirvṛtān sarvadharmānaprajānānaḥ ātmānaṃ paraṃ ca upalabhate |
1064:333: sa rakto duṣṭo mūḍhaḥ san trividhaṃ karma abhisaṃskaroti kāyena vācā manasā |
1064:337: tasya tathāgataśāsane pravrajitasya evaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ śīlavān,
1064:353: tasya evamavekṣamāṇasya utpadyate nirvitsahagato manasikāraḥ animittapurogataḥ |
1064:357: sa ebhyo dharmebhya ārtīyate jehrīyate vitarati vijugupsate uttrasyati saṃtrasyati saṃtrāsamāpadyate |
1064:364: sa eko rahogataḥ tān dharmān manasi kurvan śamathaṃ pratilabhate |
1064:365: tasya tena nirvitsahagatena manasikāreṇa śamatha utpadyate |
1064:366: tasya sarvadharmeṣu cittaṃ pratilīyate prativahati pratyudāvartate,
1064:374: tasya kāṅkṣā ca vicikitsā ca bhavati buddhabodhau |
1064:377: yathāpīdamanutpannān sarvadharmān vikalpayitvā tathāgate vicikitsāṃ vimatiṃ cotpādayati ||
1064:378: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocat - kathaṃ punarbhagavaṃścatvāri āryasatyāni draṣṭavyāni?
1064:388: sa na kalpayati na vikalpayati - ime kuśalā dharmāḥ,
1064:397: tathāhi sa taṃ dharmaṃ na samanupaśyati yaṃ parikalpayet |
1064:398: bālapṛthagjanāstu etān dharmān kalpayanto rajyanti ca dviṣanti ca muhyanti ca |
1064:400: tasya evamanāvyūhato'nirvyūhataḥ traidhātuke citta na sajjati,
1064:405: yatra kastatra saṃsāro nirvāṇaṃ kiṃ vikalpyate ||10||
1064:406: yatra hi nāma paramārthasatye naivaṃ na nirvāṇasamāropaḥ na nirvāṇādhyāropaḥ saṃbhavati,
1064:410: kiṃ vā tatra nirvāṇaṃ yatprāpyarthaṃ vikalpyate? athavā |
1064:411: yatra nirvāṇe kasyacit sattvasya saṃsārādapakarṣaṇamapanayanaṃ nirvāṇe ca samāropaṇaṃ prayatnavatāpi na śakyate kartuṃ saṃsāranirvāṇayorapyanupalabhyamānatvāt,
1064:416: atha mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ tasyāṃ velāyāṃ tathārūpaṃ samanvāhāraṃ samanvāharati sma,
1064:417: yanmāraḥ pāpīyānindrakīlabandhanabaddho dharaṇītalaprapatitaḥ utkrośati sma- gāḍhabandhanabaddho'smi |
1064:418: mañjuśrīrāha - asti pāpīyannetasmādbandhanādgāḍhataraṃ bandhanaṃ yena tvaṃ nityabaddho na punarbadhyase?
1064:422: ato bandhanād gāḍhataraṃ bandhanaṃ na saṃvidyate |
1064:425: āha - kiṃ tvaṃ pāpīyannāttamanā bhūyāḥ yadi mucyethāḥ |
1064:428: atha khalu suyāmo devaputro mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - utsṛja mañjuśrīrmāraṃ pāpīyāṃsam |
1064:430: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto māraṃ pāpīyāṃsametadavocat - kenāsi pāpīyan baddho yadātmānamutsṛjasi?
1064:431: āha - na jāne mañjuśrīḥ - kenāsmi baddhaḥ iti |
1064:432: āha - yathā tvaṃ pāpīyan abaddho baddhasaṃjñī,
1064:451: ata eva āgamād asadviparyāsakalpanāmātralatābandhanavicchedo vimokṣo nirvāṇamityucyate svapnopalabdhadahanajvālānirvāpaṇavat tadanilasalilairiti ||10||
